headline: NRG Energy Inc. stock underperforms Tuesday when compared to competitors

headline: NRG, LS Power ask FERC to approve $12B gas-fired power plant, demand-response deal
summary: NRG’s capacity in the PJM Interconnection would jump to 9.5 GW from 2.1 GW under the deal, which doesn’t pose market power risks, the companies said.
